poem:
The Glimpse

In swift embrace  
flickers of  
the new century dart—  
Russian reels  
and Maverick's dive,  
theater whispers  
and Pokémon's spark.

In hands,  
in eyes,  
in moving lights—  
a chorus,  
a burst,  
not lost—  
only paused—  
amidst  
our chasing time.
